label: 荒事
本: Edo Culture: Daily Life and Diversions in Urban Japan, 1600-1868 . University of Hawai'i Press . 1997
説明文: Rough kabuki acting style,particularly as developed by Ichikawa Danjurō, that features nonnaturalistic makeup and grandiose, exaggerated, vigorously masculine deportment.［歌舞伎、市川團十郎］
